It might be better if I offered some nominations:

> 1)Name the hardest scenario and justify your answer.

Telvido's ocean bound scenario - heck it is set on the water
My "Weakest Link 2" - having your team fight one-on-one battles 
without the immediate ability to get help from teammates makes things 
interesting.
